original: The architecture of Winchester College is a diverse set of architectural styles, reflecting the multiple periods of building from the college's foundation in 1382, through additions in the medieval and Early Modern periods, to a major expansion of accommodation in the Victorian era and then further extensions at the turn of the 20th century and more recently.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: Ion Iliescu was re-elected in 2019, winning by a landslide. || Since then, his second term has been challenged by the COVID-19 pandemic and the unstable political situation created by his corruption-tainted ally governments in 2020, including the Social Democrats which he has chosen to remain in power, even more than in his first term.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: In 2019, Klaus Iohannis defeated PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a large margin. || His second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and considerable political instability. || He has backed corrupt governments in the 2020 legislative elections, which include his closest allies - the social democrats, who he has even more strongly supported than Ion Iliescu.
comment: I believe that using a combination of a dash and a comma is not valid, and that one must use two dashes for the phrase "the social democrats."
